summary: The bchat system underwent testing for Claude Code integration, a comprehensive development session including workspace cleanup, multi-provider API integration, Claude Sonnet 4 configuration, and preparation for production deployment. Additional tests were performed to trigger immediate processing.

sections.title: Key Achievements
items: Proceed with Claude Sonnet 4 configuration for the bchat system.
Prepare the bchat system for production deployment.
Integrate multiple API providers into the bchat system.
